testng-results.suite:
<#list tests as test>
<test-method status="<#if test.failed>FAIL<#else>PASS</#if>" signature="${test.testInfo.name?html}" name="${test.testInfo.name?html}" duration-ms="${test.duration?c}" started-at="${test.testInfo.startedAt?string('yyyy-MM-dd\'T\'HH:mm:ss\'Z\'')}" finished-at="${test.testInfo.endedAt?string('yyyy-MM-dd\'T\'HH:mm:ss\'Z\'')}" description=""> <#if test.testInfo.exception?has_content>
${test.exceptionMessage?html} ${test.exceptionStacktrace?html}
</#if>
</#list>
